summary.para: Called when a key down event occurs.

param.name: wParam
param.para: The WPARAM of the key event. For more information about this parameter, see the wParam parameter in WM_KEYDOWN.

param.name: lParam
param.para: The LPARAM of the key event. For more information about this parameter, see the lParam parameter in WM_KEYDOWN.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called when a key up event occurs.

param.name: wParam
param.para: The WPARAM of the key event. For more information about this parameter, see the wParam parameter in WM_KEYUP.

param.name: lParam
param.para: The LPARAM of the key event. For more information about this parameter, see the lParam parameter in WM_KEYUP.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The ITfKeyTraceEventSink interface is implemented by an application or text service to receive key stroke event notifications before the event is processed by the target. This advise sink is installed by calling the thread manager method with IID_ITfKeyTraceEventSink.

remarks.para: The difference between ITfKeyTraceEventSink and events is that ITfKeyTraceEventSink events occur before any filtering or processing of the key event occurs. The ITfKeyTraceEventSink events also occur before the target application can process the key event.
